metadata.name: EtherealStates 1/1 MintPass - Free Mint
metadata.description:
[Ethereal States](https://etherealstates.art/) is a generative pixel art banner format NFT project by [Genuine Human Art](https://twitter.com/GenuineHumanArt).

If you got airdropped this MintPass, it means you are a 1/1 Holder of Genuine Human Art work.

This Mint Pass can be redeemed against one free Ethereal States NFT (+gas). It also includes an optional and exclusive Holder Trait available at minting time.

This MintPass is valid from the start of the Holder's Mint 24hr period. After the Holder's Mint period has elapsed, redemption is subject to supply.
